item.title: How do i make my ice barrage
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

add this in your ice barrage spell castOnPlayer.entangle();make sure you have public void entangle() { EntangleDelay = 70; }

and also make sure you have these

public int EntangleDelay = 0;

if(EntangleDelay > 0) EntangleDelay -= 1;

[code]case 98: // walk on command
closeInterface();
resetAnimation();
if(faceNPC > 0) {
ResetAttack();
ResetAttackNPC();

}
IsAttackingNPC = false;
attacknpc = -1;

if(EntangleDelay >= 1) {
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from moving!”);
}
if (IsDead == false && EntangleDelay <= 0) {
newWalkCmdSteps = packetSize - 5;
if(newWalkCmdSteps % 2 != 0)
println_debug(“Warning: walkTo(”+packetType+") command malformed: “+misc.Hex(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize));
newWalkCmdSteps /= 2;
if(++newWalkCmdSteps > walkingQueueSize) {
println_debug(“Warning: walkTo(”+packetType+”) command contains too many steps ("+newWalkCmdSteps+").");
newWalkCmdSteps = 0;
break;[/code]

Read full topic
